channel.title: Door requires key
channel.description:
Im using hiyascape source base, kinda like project czar, and i was wondering how do i make a certain door require a key,
For example
the house in varrock, to get in you will need to use a bronze key on the door.
I want to do this so i can give my players houses. anyone know? who ever helps will get admin status on my server

item.title: Door requires key
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

that didnt work, i put it above case 72 attack

case 1530:
if ((playerHasItemAmount(993, 1) == true)) {
            teleportToX = 3241;
            teleportToY = 3473;

}

    case 72: // Click to attack
        if (attacknpc > 0) {
            sendMessage("You are already attacking an npc!");
        } else {

it let me through with out the key, and when i had the keyâ€¦ did i do something wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Door requires key
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

case DOORID:
if ((playerHasItemAmount(ITEMID, AMOUNT) == true)) {
teleportToX = ###;
teleportToY = ###;
}

Place the code anywhere above Public Boolean Process

Example:

case 6728:
if ((playerHasItemAmount(85, 1) == true)) {
teleportToX = 2780;
teleportToY = 2050;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Door requires key
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

can you make that into an example please. with actual coordinates [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 02:16:56 PM[/size][hr]where do i place this code?

Read full topic

item.title: Door requires key
item.dc:creator: @Dinovion Dinovion
item.description:
@Dinovion wrote:

You need to use.

[center]if(atObjectID == Door && useItemID == Key) { TeletoX = X; TeletoY = Y; }[/center]

Read full topic
